text: This week I really tried to remain mindful when I wasn't meditating. My meditation time was a time to re-ground, and check in with myself. I really enjoyed the "thoughts are bubbles" concept. Historically I have used a roundabout visual with thoughts being cars (that was touched on in one of the readings too). The bubbles seem a little less challenging and aggressive to me. I liked the cloud imagery as well. I have done a lot of cloud spotting, and this felt both familiar and relaxing.
